topic.title: log-iw-size()
topic.para: Description: The size of the initial window, this value is used during flow control. Make sure that log-iw-size() is larger than the value of log-fetch-limit().

When using wildcards in the filenames, &abbrev; attempts to read log-fetch-limit() number of messages from each file. For optimal performance, make sure that log-iw-size() is greater than log-fetch-limit()*(the-number-of-matching-files).

example.title: Initial window size of file sources
example.para: If log-fetch-limit() is 10, and your wildcard file source has 200 files, then log-iw-size() should be at least 2000.
